attributes.action: Petition to keep child attackers, abducters and abusers in jail for LIFE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After reading a horrific story of the evil abuse and rape of a girl of 5, I feel the need to start a UK petition for the law to be changed so these people should be put in prison for life.

It is potentially possible that people such as these who abuse could be out in 7 years... look at stories such as James Bulger, Sarah Payne, and Holly Wells & Jessica Chapman...all of which are CHILDREN who should never be subjected to such evil of abduction, abuse and/or murder.

The sad fact of society is that these attacks seem to be more frequent, and we need to ensure these evil people are locked up away from our kids and families!
